title: League Bad Image Again...
body: I did all of what the Riot admin told me to do and now a week or so later, it is having another bad image problem. It is always when an update happens too, help please...

replies.body: Sorry this is still happening.  :(  There's a good chance your OS settings or anti-virus is blocking your game files from running and installing correctly.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore permissions, then see if another reinstall with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) helps.  Let me know!
Thanks dude, I reinstalled before I saw this, so if I see the Bad image error pop up again I will follow these steps. Thanks!
